1. Developed a website for an AI based postural analysis and sport bio-mechanical analysis using MERN stack 
 2. Built a chatbot with source identification for answering questions on fitness and nutrition with the use of BERT models

Created a full stack website for Kaatru using MERN stack. Representation of data on embedded maps for better understanding of weather and road conditions for best route estimation between source and destination.
Worked in the area of Computer Vision to create a model for classification between smoking and non-smoking person.
Worked under Alumni Association to create alumni website [Alma Connect] for NIT Andhra Pradesh.
Worked in the area of Search, Ranking and Information Retrieval using Python for intelligent web scraping.
Worked as a mentor to students from grade 1-12 teaching programming languages and web development concepts.
Worked as a full stack developer under Cisco Talent Outreach Program to develop school's library management system.
